Zero-Runtime Scoped CSS

Component-level style encapsulation with 0KB runtime overhead

How It Works

  • Build Time Transformation: CSS selectors are rewritten during the build (.btn â†’ .btn[data-v-abc123])
  • Template Injection: Data attributes are added to template elements (<button data-v-abc123>)
  • Zero Runtime: No JavaScript runs in the browser for style scoping
  • No Style Bleeding: Each component's styles are completely isolated
  • Build Tool Support: Works with esbuild, Vite, and Rollup

Build Configuration

import { scopedCSSPlugin } from 'reflex/scoped-css';

esbuild.build({
  entryPoints: ['src/app.js'],
  bundle: true,
  plugins: [
    scopedCSSPlugin({
      include: /\.component\.html$/,
      cssOutput: 'dist/styles.css',
      minify: true
    })
  ]
});

Special Selectors

/* Deep selector - styles children from parent */
.parent :deep(.child) { color: blue; }
/* Output: .parent[data-v-xxx] .child */

/* Global selector - escapes scoping */
:global(.external-class) { color: red; }
/* Output: .external-class */

/* Slotted selector - for slot content */
:slotted(.slot-item) { padding: 1rem; }
/* Output: .slot-item[data-v-xxx] */
